resources.string: Once a year, a fast motorcycle can be found competing on public roads in what is wildy regarded as the most dangerous race in the world. Where is this motorcycle?
The event is held on an island in the Irish sea
The Isle of Man TT (Tourist Trophy) race has been held annually on the Isle of Man since 1907. It is a 38mile long course with 219 turns with top speeds reaching 200mph
This rock-hewn church and UNESCO site was built around the 12th century and was of great spiritual importance then and even today. There are 10 more close by. Where is this church?
The oldest human remains known to man share the same country with this church.
The church of St George is 1 of 11 in the ciy of Lalibela, Ethiopia. It is renowned its architecture and regarded as the most well preserved out all the churches
This is a timed game. Pressing "START" initiates the timer and it will continue running as you solve clues.
To solve each clue, you must be within 0.2km (200meters) of the Clue location.
Once you think you have found a location, press "FOUND IT". The timer will pause and your phone location will be calculated
If you are NOT within 0.2km, you will receive a notification and be redirected to try and solve the clue again
If you are within 0.2km, the clue is considered solved and only then will you be able to move onto the next clue
A hint is provided for each clue. By clicking the "HINT" button you may present or hide the hint at your discretion
A hint is provided for each clue. By clicking the "HINT" button you may present or hide the view at your discretion
After solving each clue, you will be receive a fun fact about the location. Solving the final clue will end the game
You may press quit at the Clue Screen if you wish to stop or simply close the app.
